00021 
00022 #ifdef SWIG
00023 struct QState;
00024 #else
00025 extern "C" {
00026    // The following struct declaration is quoted in verbatim from Scott
00027    // Aaronson's CHP program. (Scott, I hope, you don't mind.) It is used
00028    // here to implement the functionality of comparing a stabilizer state
00029    // in CHP with a state in graphsim. This is used to compare the action
00030    // of the two programs to ensure correctness.
00031    struct QState
00032    {
00033       long n;         // # of qubits
00034       unsigned long **x; // (2n+1)*n matrix for stabilizer/destabilizer x bits (there's one "scratch row" at
00035       unsigned long **z; // (2n+1)*n matrix for z bits                                                 the bottom)
00036       int *r;         // Phase bits: 0 for +1, 1 for i, 2 for -1, 3 for -i.  Normally either 0 or 2.
00037       unsigned long pw[32]; // pw[i] = 2^i
00038       long over32; // floor(n/8)+1
00039    }; 
00040 }
00041 #endif //SWIG
00042 
00043 //forward declarations, definition in graphsim.h:
00044 
00045 typedef unsigned long VertexIndex;
00046 struct QubitVertex;
00047 class GraphRegister;
00048 
00050 /* This class is used at the moment only by GraphRegister::print_stabilizer and for
00051 the compare method (when comparing with CHP). */
00052 struct Stabilizer {
00053    VertexIndex numQubits;
00054    vector<vector<LocCliffOp> > paulis;
00055    vector<RightPhase> rowsigns;
00056    vector<VertexIndex> vtxidx;
00057    Stabilizer (const VertexIndex numQubits_);
00058    Stabilizer (const GraphRegister& gr, const hash_set<VertexIndex>& qubits);
00059    Stabilizer (QState * qs);
00060    void add_row (unsigned target, unsigned addend);
00061    void conjugate (unsigned row, unsigned col, const LocCliffOp trans);
00062    void conjugate_column (unsigned col, const LocCliffOp trans);
00063    void print (ostream &os = cout) const;
00064    bool compare (const Stabilizer &diag);
00065 };
